articles.title: Undercover NYPD officer arrests woman who allegedly yelled anti-Asian slurs and threatened violence - CNN
articles.description: An undercover officer with the New York Police Department arrested a woman yelling anti-Asian slurs at a Chinatown nail salon, according to city officials.
articles.content:

articles.title: Museum of Ice Cream, Asia's tallest slingshot among new attractions to open in Singapore in anticipation of tourism recovery - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Three new tourist attractions will be opening their doors to visitors here in the coming months, including a popular New York attraction that will be making its first international foray.
